subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Rick Dutrow declared that Big Brown’s rival from Japan, Casino Drive, would have “no chance” at Belmont, and suggested that his colt would race into the fall.
snippet: Rick Dutrow declared that Big Brown’s rival from Japan, Casino Drive, would have “no chance” at Belmont, and suggested that his colt would race into the fall.
